data.author: Phil Hazelton

changelog.release_notes: * Added support for Fahrenheit / inches of mercury units
* Fixed first load of weather data after configuration update

* Switched weather provider to Weather Underground, for better forecast accuracy and improved detail
* Clearer display of day & night time forecasts
* Larger date font
* Current location display
* Low battery and charging notifications
* Configuration screen

data.description:
A straightforward watch face that prioritises time, date, health and weather in a clear and compact display.

From top to bottom you see:
* Current pressure / temperature / humidity
* 3-day weather forecast (blue for rain, yellow for sun, grey for clouds etc. including night times based on real-world sunrise and sunset times)
* Current location
* Low battery and charging indicators (not shown)
* Digital time display
* Weekday and date
* Step target indicator for current time of day
* Overall daily step progress (red if below target, green if above)
* Distance / step count / active calories

Weather updates based on current GPS location, every half hour for maximum battery savings. Step goals are automatically set based on averaged data.

NOTE: Due to restrictions in the Weather Underground API you will need to register a free account at wunderground.com and enter your own key on the configuration screen.

Coming soon:
* Optional vibrate on disconnect
* Background colour options
* Connection status indicators
* More unit options (including miles)

latest_release.release_notes: * Added support for Fahrenheit / inches of mercury units

data.title: Barberry
